alreadyUsedDifferentIDNumber.title: Already used
alreadyUsedDifferentIDNumber.body: Enter or scan a different ID number.

alreadyUsedQRCode.title: Already used
alreadyUsedQRCode.body: Get a new QR code that is not tagged to any contact number from your in-charge.

cancelEntry.title: Cancel entry and scan another ID number?

resendOTP.title: Resend OTP?
resendOTP.body: After 1 more OTP request, you will have to wait 3 minutes before trying again.

systemErrorConnectivityIssues.title: System error
systemErrorConnectivityIssues.body:
We are currently facing connectivity issues.
Try again later or contact your in-charge if the problem persists.

systemErrorValidityPeriod.title: System error
systemErrorValidityPeriod.body:
We could not find the validity period.
Get new QR code from your in-charge and try again.

systemErrorLoginIssue.title: System error
systemErrorLoginIssue.body:
We are currently facing login issues.
Get a new QR code from your in-charge.

systemErrorServerIssue.title: System error
systemErrorServerIssue.body: We are currently facing a server issue. Contact your in-charge if the problem persists.

expiredQR.title: Expired
expiredQR.body: Get a new QR code from your in-charge.

expiredOTP.title: Expired
expiredOTP.body: Get a new OTP and try again.

invalidInputOTPOneMoreInvalid.title: Invalid input
invalidInputOTPOneMoreInvalid.body: Enter OTP again. After 1 more invalid OTP entry, you will have to wait 3 minutes before trying again.

invalidInputIDNumber.title: Invalid input
invalidInputIDNumber.body: Enter or scan a valid ID number.

invalidInputQR.title: Invalid input
invalidInputQR.body: Scan QR code again or get a new QR code from your in-charge.

incompleteEntry.title: Incomplete entry
incompleteEntry.body: Select at least one item to checkout.

paymentCollected.title: Payment collected?
paymentCollected.body: This action cannot be undone. Proceed only when payment has been collected.

outdatedAppRestart.title: Outdated app
outdatedAppRestart.body: Restart your app to get the latest app version.

systemError.title: System error
systemError.body: We are currently facing connectivity issues. Try restarting the app or contact Govtech if the problem persists.

wrongFormatCountryCodePhoneNumber.title: Wrong format
wrongFormatCountryCodePhoneNumber.body: Enter a valid country code and contact number.

wrongFormatQRScanAgain.title: Wrong format
wrongFormatQRScanAgain.body: Scan QR code again or get a new QR code from your in-charge.

wrongFormatDeviceCode.title: Wrong format
wrongFormatDeviceCode.body: Scan device code again or get a new device from your in-charge.

wrongFormatID.title: Wrong format
wrongFormatID.body: Enter or scan a valid ID number.

wrongFormatQRGetNew.title: Wrong format
wrongFormatQRGetNew.body: Get a new QR code from your in-charge.

alreadyUsedItem.title: Already Used
alreadyUsedItem.body: Scan another item that is not tagged to any ID number

wrongFormatCode.title: Wrong format
wrongFormatCode.body: Enter or scan valid code details

systemErrorServerIssues.title: System error
systemErrorServerIssues.body: We are currently facing server issues. Try again later or contact your in-charge if the problem persists

discardTransaction.title: Discard transaction?
discardTransaction.body: This will clear all scanned items

removeItem.title: Remove item?
removeItem.body: Do you want to remove this item: %{voucherSerial}?

checkIdFormat.body: Please check that the ID is in the correct format
